name: The Stars Between Us
description:
Step into VR and take part in a love story that is out of this world! The vastness of space separates our two heroes, and only you can bring them together.

Experience intuitive and immersive gameplay as you travel between planets and stars, solving 3D puzzles at your own pace.

Join a cast of eccentric characters as they explore the cosmos, completing puzzles, collecting charms, and sharing personal stories of love and loss.

Utilize powerful Baubles to collect even more charms across over 30 fun-filled levels, with more to come!

Relax and meditate with wonderful music, inviting visuals, and soothing puzzles made for VR.
